name: Quy Nhon: 3 days, Stay with local inhabitants, exploring the lives in rural VietNam: Famers, the fisher in my village..
description: This is not a Tour or a Trip. 3 days, you will lives as local people, as family members. You will stay with my family ( free host- homestay ) and exploring  true daily village life in rural Vietnam!: ( non wifi, non internet → far from my house~ 5km ) haha.
